summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Seattle Criminal Code; changing the definition of the crime of Stalking to encompass repeated harassment in addition to repeated following, changing the crime of Obstructing a Public Servant to expand the definition of "public servant", upgrading Obstructing a Public Servant from a misdemeanor to a gross misdemeanor, and amending Sections 12A.06.035 and 12A.16.010 of the Seattle Municipal Code.
